description: This CowboyStudio Premium AC Socket & Cord Set with Umbrella Holder and Light Stand Mount is perfect for basic lighting and would be a great addition to your studio. The swivel adapter lets you have full control over your flash or slave positioning.You should mount your slave to the swivel adapter and then set it on any of your standard mount light stands. The adapter swivels in all directions, making it simple to get the light where you need it, even with difficult angles.This product is very portable and can be conveniently moved around due to its light weight.Specifications:Mounts on any standard light standHolds any bulb with a standard E26 baseMaximum capacity is 250 WattsEasy to mount an umbrella in the adapter**Please note that the umbrella, stand and bulb do not come with this listing.Directions:Mount the socket to the light stand.Then, attach the umbrella to the socket. Make sure the umbrella is secure.All that’s left is to plug it in and it is ready to use.
title: CowboyStudio Premium AC Socket & Cord Set with Umbrella Holder and Light Stand Mount
